src:
Nekad dva penala protiv njih, nekada dva crvena kartona: Inđija poklekla u 90. minutu!
Javor stigao do vredne pobede - 3:2

03 Nov 2019

Čudne stvari se dešavaju na utakmicama Inđije ove sezone. Dešavalo se da protiv novog superligaša budu dosuđena i dva penala na utakmici. Tako je bilo na Marakani, pa i u još jednoj utakmici. Danas je tim iz Srema „počašćen“ sa dva crvena kartona. Sasvim dovoljno da Inđijci ispuste prednost, te da Javor golom u 90. minutu stigne do celog plena. Na kraju je bilo 3:2 za goste.
Čak devet uzatopnih poraza imala je ekipa Inđije pre današnjeg susreta 15. kola Superlige. U jednom trenutku je delovalo da će domaćin uspeti da pronađe izlaz iz laviinta dvomesečnog neuspeha. I pored toga što su Ivanjičani imali prednost od 31. minuta kada je pogodio Marko Kolaković na asistenciju Miroslava Maričića.  
Međutim, više zanimljivijih detalja videli smo u nastavku. Mnogo više. Sjajno je Inđija otvorila drugo poluvreme. Prvo je pogodio Filip Rajevac u 47. minutu, a samo 120 sekundi kasnije Amanović je postigao autogol. Na veliku radost publike u Inđiji.
Tek tada je došlo do zapleta. Glavni arbitar Bojan Nikolić je pokazao direktan crveni karton Srđanu Dimitrovu. I to nije sve. U 76. minutu pre vremena morao je na tuširanje i Nemanja Bosančić.
Oskoljeni brojčanom prednošću Ivanjičani su svim silama krenuli u napad. Logičan potez napravila je ekipa Igora Bondžulića. I to joj se isplatilo. Izjednačenje je stiglo u 80. minutu, strelac je bio Nikola Petković. Isti igrač je pogodio u 90. minutu i to iz penala i zaokružio meč pun varnica.

SRBIJA 1 - 15. KOLO: 


Subota

Partizan - Vojvodina 4:0 (2:0)/Natho 29 pen i 43, Zdjelar 48, Sakik 69/Prolter - Crvena zvezda 0:2 (0:0)/Garsija 59, Boaći 82/

Nedelja

Inđija - Javor 2:3 (0:1)/Rajevac 47, Amanović 49 ag - Kolaković 31, Petković 80 i 90/15.00:  (2,85) TSC  (3,10)  Radnički Niš (2,60) 15.00:  (5,00) Mačva  (3,40)  Čukarčki (1,80) 15.00:  (2,15) Napredak  (3,20)  Spartak (3,60) 15.00:  (2,60) Rad  (3,05)  Mladost (2,90) 15.00:  (2,45) Radnik  (3,10)  Voždovac (3,10) 
NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Sometimes two penalties against them, sometimes two red cards: Indjija knelt in the 90th minute!
Maple reached a valuable victory - 3: 2

03 Nov 2019

Strange things are happening at Indjija matches this season. It happened that two new penalties were awarded against the new Super League players. So it was at Marakana, even in another game. Today, the Srem team is honored with two red cards. It is enough for the Indians to miss the advantage, and for the map to reach all the loot in the 90th minute. In the end it was 3: 2 for the guests.
Nine consecutive defeats were the team of Indjija before today's match of the 15th round of Superliga. At one point it seemed that the host would be able to find a way out of the labyrinth of two months of failure. Even though the Ivanjicans had a 31-minute advantage when it was scored by Marko Kolakovic with Miroslav Maricic's assist.
However, we have seen more interesting details below. A lot more. Great Indjija opened the second half. Filip Rajevac was first hit in the 47th minute, and just 120 seconds later Amanovic scored an own goal. Much to the delight of the Indjija audience.
It was only then that the complications came. Chief Referee Bojan Nikolic showed a red card to Srdjan Dimitrov. And that's not all. Nemanja Bosancic had to take a shower in the 76th minute.
Enraged by the numerical advantage, the citizens of Ivanjica launched an attack. The logical move was made by the team of Igor Bondzulic. And it paid off. The equalizer came in the 80th minute, the scorer was Nikola Petkovic. The same player hit in the 90th minute from a penalty and rounded out a match full of sparks.

SERBIA 1 - 15TH ROUND:


Saturday

Partizan - Vojvodina 4: 0 (2: 0) / Natho 29 pins and 43, Zdjelar 48, Sakik 69 / Prolter - Crvena Zvezda 0: 2 (0: 0) / Garcia 59, Boaci 82 /

Sunday

Indjija - Javor 2: 3 (0: 1) / Rajevac 47, Amanovic 49 ag - Kolakovic 31, Petkovic 80 i 90 / 15.00: (2,85) TSC (3,10) Radnicki Nis (2,60) 15.00: ( 5.00) Sword (3.40) Chukarka (1.80) 15.00: (2.15) Progress (3.20) Spartak (3.60) 15.00: (2.60) Work (3.05) Youth ( 2.90) 15.00: (2.45) Worker (3.10) Vozdovac (3.10)
